General.Name: Sun Pharmaceutical Industries Limited
General.Description: Sun Pharmaceutical Industries Limited, a generic pharmaceutical company, develops, manufactures, and markets branded and generic formulations and active pharmaceutical ingredients (APIs) in India and internationally. The company offers formulations in various therapeutic areas, including central nervous system, dermatology, cardiology, oncology, neuropsychiatry, gastroenterology, anti-infectives, diabetology, pain/analgesics, vitamins/minerals/nutrients, respiratory, gynaecology, urology, ophthalmology, orthopaedic, nephrology, dental, and other areas. It provides APIs for anti-cancers, peptides, steroids, hormones, and immunosuppressant drugs. In addition, the company offers generic medications, such as tablets, capsules, injectables, inhalers, ointments, creams, and liquids; speciality medications, and anti retro viral medications, as well as over-the-counter products. The company was founded in 1983 and is based in Mumbai, India.

1.Name: Mr. Kalyanasundaram  Subramanian
